rect.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); visibility: hidden;
rect.title: Background

circle.style: stroke-miterlimit: 4.89; paint-order: stroke; filter: url("#inner-shadow-filter-0"); fill-rule: nonzero; stroke-width: 2px; stroke-dasharray: 8; fill: url("#gradient-1-0");
circle.title: ScreenCircle

g.style: filter: none; opacity: 0.3; transform-origin: -0.000771px 0.000211px; pointer-events: none; mix-blend-mode: soft-light; mask: url("#mask-0");
g.title: ScreenLines

line.style: fill: none; vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; mix-blend-mode: screen; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 2px;
line.title: Vertical

line.style: fill: none; vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; mix-blend-mode: screen; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 2px;
line.title: Vertical

path.style: fill-rule: nonzero; paint-order: stroke markers; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); filter: none; fill: rgb(51, 155, 31);
path.title: OuterRing
